typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		depid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		depid as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
